body:
Comment 2: 
Explain what question?  This is a bug report about the fact that the combination of some
CGO code and goinstall produce an executable that seg faults when it should be producing
reasonable output.  The included code is a distillation of my full application to a
minimal test case that can cause the seg fault.  I thing the problem boils down to the
linker putting a constant value in an 8-byte aligned location when it should be 16-byte
aligned.
